basic.Peptide Name: Bradykinin-potentiating peptide BmK3 (Bpp BmK3; NDBP-3.3; Arthropods, animals)
basic.Target Organism: [Ref.22115565]Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli DH 5-α (MIC=2.3 µM), Haemophilus inﬂuenzae ATCC 31517 (MIC=3.2 µM), Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13882 (MIC=2.8 µM), Salmonella enterica ATCC 8090 (MIC=2.3 µM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9229 (MIC=4.7 µM), Serratia marcescens ATCC 13880 (MIC=68.2 µM);Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6051 (MIC=24.4 µM), Listeria monocytogenes ATCC 35152 (MIC=5.7 µM), Micrococcus luteus ATCC 9341 (MIC=20.3 µM), Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 14508 (MIC=57.1 µM), Nocardia asteroides ATCC 3308 (MIC>70 µM), Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 14458 (MIC>70 µM);Fungi:Neurospora crassa FGSC 2489 (IC50=2 µM), Botrytis cinerea ATCC 28387 (IC50=3.1 µM), Fusarium culmorum ATCC 32973 (IC50=0.2 µM).
